alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:21PM MST until August 17 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 621 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Phoenix Mesa Gateway Airport to near San Tan Valley to 6 miles northeast of Magma, moving southwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Gold Canyon, Queen Creek, Blackwater, Chandler Heights, Gold Camp, San Tan Mountain Park, Magma and San Tan Valley. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 200 and 209. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 143 and 145. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
